item.title: Sound Fixes Pack v24.25 ATS
item.description:
Sound Fixes Pack v24.25 ATS

CHANGELOG v24.25
1 new additional variation of the default air cutoff sound for when the air compressor is unloaded by the governor.
Fixed an issue with brake squeaking sound playing when not braking while the traction control & anti-lock braking system were on.

CHANGELOG v24.24
Engine and horn sounds added to the 2007 DAF XF 105 in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition]

Engine and horn sounds added to the 2010 Scania R730 and the 2009 Scania R560 in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition] – Special thanks to Max2712 for permission to use some of his sound samples in accordance to these Scania trucks.

Applied more suitable sounds for some AI traffic vehicles in ProMods Canada. [ATS edition] – Canadian Pacific train
– 2005-2007 Ford F-350 XL Super Duty Regular Cab Ambulance
– Pierce Arrow XT

DESCRIPTION
This mod has been bringing more immersion to common sounds in the game for over 8 years!

It packs a lot of sound content within one mod, making it great value within the 100 mod limit in Convoy multiplayer.

COMPATIBILITY
* ETS2 1.50.2 + ATS 1.50.1. No errors in game log. Must have high priority in Mod Manager.
* Does not replace individual player truck sounds, so this mod can be used with an unlimited amount of truck sound mods of your choice.
* Compatible with all maps and all trucks, including truck mods.
* Supported in single-player and multiplayer Convoy mode, and is marked as an optional mod in Convoy.
* If hosting a Convoy dedicated server with this mod, it is recommended to turn on “mods_optioning” to prevent mod version restrictions.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
Requires higher priority in Mod Manager than:
– any map mods (e.g. ProMods)
– any AI traffic mods (e.g. traffic packs and traffic pack add-ons)
– any rain sound mods (unless proven to be compatible)

FEATURE LIST
The mod features meticulously crafted sounds, covering the following:

– An extensive variety of suspension and truck and trailer tire bump sounds.
– Fuel / filling station sounds.
– Door close and seatbelt sounds after refueling.
– Train sound enhancements, including authentic sounds for several locomotives and railroad cars.
– Country/state specific railroad crossing bell sounds.
– The most complete tire sound package, including tire noise for all terrains: asphalt, gravel, grass, snow, and sleeper lines.
– Wet tire sound for the player’s truck tires when the asphalt roads are wet.
– Reworked tire screech sound effects.
– Working sounds for the Musical Road in American Truck Simulator’s Historic Route 66.
– Nokia phone ringtone sound replacing the hurry up / late music, leading to less stress for the player.
– Default common sound reworks, such as improved default air brake sounds and a softer default reverse beep.
– AI traffic vehicle sound improvements, with engine and horn sounds uniquely set for specific vehicles.
– English AU/UK/US voice navigation variants with speaker effect added and uncustomary phrases removed.
– Wind buffeting and rush of air sounds at high speeds only when the window is open.
– Additional environmental and ambient sounds, and tasteful changes to existing ambient sounds in the game world.
– Trailer coupling and trailer brace rotation sounds.
– Four standalone air horns.
– Dynamic rain sounds, and an assortment of different thunder sounds with delay.
– The default wiper sound may now squeak only when the windshield is dry.
– Default gear grinding sound effect additions and improvements.
– Stronger reverb effects when under bridges and overpasses.
– (ATS only) Drawbridge lift warning sound for the Columbia River Interstate Bridge.
– (Optional) Reefer / refrigerated trailer sound functionality.
– (Optional – ATS only) Cop scouting reports via CB radio (enable in voice navigation options).
– Fixes for World Ambient sound glitches from the vanilla game.

For further immersion, the mod may also include official paint colors and more authentic specifications for each AI traffic vehicle it modifies for sound. Rarer paint colors are less likely to be seen.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Sound Fixes Pack v24.25 – Stable release ETS2
item.description:
Sound Fixes Pack v24.25 – Stable release ETS2

CHANGELOG v24.25
1 new additional variation of the default air cutoff sound for when the air compressor is unloaded by the governor.
Fixed an issue with brake squeaking sound playing when not braking while the traction control & anti-lock braking system were on.

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: CAMINHAO VOLKSWAGEN CONSTELLATION COMPLETO 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
CAMINHAO VOLKSWAGEN CONSTELLATION COMPLETO 1.50 ETS2

VW Constellation:
– High and low roof;
– Several different chassis;
– All engines and transmissions configured according to the technical data sheet;
– Two sound options (alternating according to the engine option);
– A multitude of accessories;
– Various company liveries;
– Skin edit available



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

DENUNCIA MINHA PIKA FDP

item.title: Peterbilt 387 v1.3.150 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Peterbilt 387 v1.3.150 1.50 ETS2

Changelog v1.3.50

General changes:
– Added compatibility package with DLC JCB Equipment Pack;
– Updated registration of items from the Steam inventory;
– Updated menu icons due to changes in the menu interface in version 1.50.

External:
– Added IFTA stickers for 2024 and stickers for new states (Louisiana, Arkansas, Missouri);
– Minor fixes for shortcomings identified after the transition to game version 1.50;
– Edits of particle dumes (dust and dirt) from wheels for the new particle system in game version 1.50.

Interior:
– The previous interface font used for the on-board computer is registered separately and included in the mod after the changes to the interface fonts in game version 1.50.

– Standalone;
– 3 cabins;
– 9 chassis;
– Support for advanced coupling;
– Cable support;
– 7 engines
– 26 gearboxes Mack mDrive, Allison, Eaton Fuller and Meritor MaxiTorque;
All engines and gearboxes with original parameters

Files/addons in the archive
Peterbilt_387_v1.3.150_ets2.scs Truck
Peterbilt_387_v.1.3.150_addon_DLC_ETS2.scs adds compatibility with DLC from ETS2
Peterbilt_387_v.1.3.150_addon_ETS2_mirrors_FOV.scs Place addon for hood mirrors in ETS2 (put above all mods)
Peterbilt_387_v.1.3.150_addon_camera_SMRC.scs walking camera (for amateurs)
Peterbilt_387_v.1.3.150_SMP_compatibility.scs Addon that adds support for SiSL’s Mega Pack



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
